mlDocs.author: Sabbamitta

sn12.27:2.2.pli: Yā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jarā jīraṇatā khaṇḍiccaṁ pāliccaṁ valittacatā āyuno saṁhāni indriyānaṁ paripāko—
sn12.27:2.2.de: Das Alter, das Herunterkommen, bröckelige Zähne, graue Haare, runzelige Haut, abnehmende Lebensenergie und versagende Sinneskräfte bei den verschiedenen Wesen der verschiedenen Gattungen von Wesen;
sn12.27:2.2.en: The old age, decrepitude, broken teeth, grey hair, wrinkly skin, diminished vitality, and failing faculties of the various sentient beings in the various orders of sentient beings.

mlDocs.title:
Mittlere Lehrreden 141
Die Aufgliederung der Wahrheiten

dn31:14.20.de: Sie schwinden dahin wie der abnehmende Mond.
dn31:14.20.en: they diminish like the waning moon.

mn9:22.2.pli: Yā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jarā jīraṇatā khaṇḍiccaṁ pāliccaṁ valittacatā āyuno saṁhāni indriyānaṁ paripāko—

mn9:22.2.en: The old age, decrepitude, broken teeth, gray hair, wrinkly skin, diminished vitality, and failing faculties of the various sentient beings in the various orders of sentient beings.
